title: CP Level 1: Foundations
description: Math basics, time complexity, arrays, strings, basic STL.

title: CP Level 2: Core DSA
description: Stacks/Queues, Linked Lists, Hashing, Binary Search, Two Pointers.

title: CP Level 3: Graphs & DP
description: Trees, Graph Traversals, Shortest Paths, DP patterns.

title: CP Level 4: Advanced
description: Segment Trees, BIT, Advanced DP, Number Theory intro.
